revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=D-Link |model=DIR-815 |revision=A1 |upc=790069336119 |ean= |asin=B0042X3F76 |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=07/06/2010 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Alpha Networks |manuf_model=WRG-ND08 |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=KA2IR815A1 |ic_id=4216A-IR815A1 |us_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2 |pwr_barrel_len=10 |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT3662 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV320DBTI-70G |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=ESMT |ram1_model=M12L2561616A-6T |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT3662 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi2_chip1_model=RT3092 |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=IC+ |sw_model=IP175D |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags=boot log |stock_boot=U-Boot;3.3;Ralink; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.33.2; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid=dlink,dlink_media |default_ssid_regex=^dlink$,,,^dlink_media$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass= |oui=14:D6:4D, 1C:7E:E5, 34:08:04, 5C:D9:98 |oui_eth=14:D6:4D, 1C:7E:E5, 34:08:04, 5C:D9:98 }} ''Wireless N Dual Band Router''
Simultaneous Dual-Band
10/100 Ethernet
{{SupportPage|vendor=D-Link|model=DIR-815}} "8WRGND08.1A1G" is silkscreened on the board. The default SSIDs for the router are '''dlink''' (2.4GHz) and '''dlink_media''' (5GHz). '''Note:''' Telnet is enabled by default on (at least) FW v1.00. Credentials are '''Alphanetworks''':wrgnd08_dlob_dir815. The power adapter included with the router is a '''Global Yeou Diann Electric Industrial''' AMS3-0502500SU. ID/OD/Len measurements are approximate. ==Images== File:D-Link DIR-815 A1 board top.jpg|board top File:D-Link DIR-815 A1 board bot.jpg|board bottom File:D-Link DIR-815 A1 label.jpg|label [[Has images::internal| ]][[Has images::label| ]] ==Serial== ===Pinout=== TX and RX pins are clearly marked on the board @ '''JP1'''. GND is right above the TX pin. ===Derived info from FW v1.00 (built @ 2010-08-06)=== {{SCollapse|boot log |
